data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, convict the 29,945 believers in Tiruchirappalli to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Tiruchirappalli
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Vallan people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Tiruchirappalli.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Tiruchirappalli that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.
